templatesPage.title: Wedding Website Templates
templatesPage.subtitle: Choose from {count} stunning templates designed to make your special day unforgettable. From classic elegance to modern minimalism, find your perfect match.
templatesPage.searchPlaceholder: Search templates by name, style, or theme...
templatesPage.noTemplatesDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters to find what you're looking for.
templatesPage.ctaTitle: Ready to Create Your Wedding Website?
templatesPage.ctaSubtitle: Sign up now and get access to all {freeCount} free templates instantly. Upgrade anytime for premium and exclusive designs.

helpPage.title: How can we help you?
helpPage.subtitle: Tutorials, guides & answers for wedding planners.
helpPage.searchPlaceholder: Search for help articles, tutorials, or FAQs...
helpPage.featuredSubtitle: Watch our most popular video guides to get started quickly.
helpPage.categorySubtitle: Explore our comprehensive help documentation organized by topic.
helpPage.videoSubtitle: Step-by-step video guides covering every feature of WeddingFlo.
helpPage.noVideosDescription: Try adjusting your search or category filter.
helpPage.faqSubtitle: Quick answers to common questions about WeddingFlo.
helpPage.supportDescription: Our support team is here to help. Reach out and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.

tutorials.gettingStartedDesc: Set up your account & create your first wedding project.
tutorials.createWebsiteDesc: Build a wedding website with templates.
tutorials.guestManagementDesc: Import guests, send invites & track RSVPs.
tutorials.budgetTrackingDesc: Track your budget with AI predictions.
tutorials.timelineBuilderDesc: Build day-of timelines with AI optimization.
tutorials.emailAutomationDesc: Automated email sequences for guests & vendors.
tutorials.aiFeaturesDesc: AI chat, budget predictions & email generation.

faqs.createProject: How do I create my first wedding project?
faqs.createProjectAnswer: Click "New Client" in your dashboard, enter couple details & start planning.
faqs.importGuests: Can I import my existing guest list?
faqs.importGuestsAnswer: Yes! Upload CSV or Excel files. Go to Guests > Import.
faqs.websiteTemplates: How do wedding website templates work?
faqs.websiteTemplatesAnswer: Choose from 20 templates, customize & publish. Free plans get 5 templates.
faqs.mobileAppAnswer: WeddingFlo is a PWA. Add to home screen for offline access.
faqs.aiAssistant: How does the AI assistant work?
faqs.aiAssistantAnswer: AI helps with budget predictions, email writing & timeline optimization.
faqs.coupleAccess: Can couples access their wedding plans?
faqs.coupleAccessAnswer: Yes! Send a portal invite for client access to timelines & guest lists.

stripeConnect.whyStripeText: This allows you to receive payments directly from clients. We handle the payment processing securely through Stripe.
stripeConnect.actionRequiredText: Complete your Stripe onboarding to start receiving payments. This process takes about 5 minutes.
stripeConnect.underReviewText: Your account is being reviewed by Stripe. This usually takes 1-2 business days.

tips.title: WhatsApp Tips
tips.phoneFormatDesc: Always include the country code (e.g., +1 for US, +91 for India). Example: +1234567890
tips.messageLimitsDesc: WhatsApp messages are limited to 1,600 characters. Keep your messages concise.
tips.optInDesc: Users must opt-in to receive WhatsApp messages. Make sure you have permission.
tips.responseTimeDesc: WhatsApp messages are usually delivered instantly, but can take up to a few minutes.
tips.pricingDesc: Twilio charges per WhatsApp message. Check your Twilio console for current rates.

setup.title: WhatsApp Setup Required
setup.description: To send WhatsApp messages, you need to configure your Twilio WhatsApp Business number.
setup.step1Desc: Create a Twilio account and enable WhatsApp Business API.
setup.step2Desc: Request a WhatsApp-enabled phone number from Twilio.
setup.step4Desc: Use the Twilio sandbox to test messages before going live.
setup.step5Desc: Submit your business profile for approval to send to real numbers.

features.title: WhatsApp Business API
features.richMediaDesc: Send images, videos, documents, and location data alongside text messages.
features.twoWayDesc: Receive and respond to messages from your clients in real-time.
features.templatesDesc: Create pre-approved message templates for common scenarios.
features.receiptsDesc: Track when messages are sent, delivered, and read by recipients.

error.invalidNumber: Invalid WhatsApp number format. Must include country code (e.g., +1234567890)

signing.title: Sign Document
signing.subtitle: Review and sign the document below
signing.invalidLink: This signing link is invalid or has already been used
signing.expiredLink: This signing link has expired. Please request a new one.
signing.signatureSecured: Your signature has been securely recorded and the document is now legally binding.
signing.copySentByEmail: A copy of the signed document will be sent to your email. The wedding planner will also receive notification of your signature.
signing.responseRecorded: Your response has been recorded. The wedding planner will be notified.
signing.signHere: Sign here with your finger or stylus
signing.useFingerMouseStylus: Use your finger, mouse, or stylus
signing.legalConsent: I agree that my electronic signature is the legal equivalent of my handwritten signature on this document and I intend to be legally bound by this document.
signing.electronicConsent: I consent to conduct business electronically and receive documents electronically as provided under the ESIGN Act and UETA.
signing.securityNotice: Your signature, IP address, timestamp, and device information will be securely recorded as part of the legally binding audit trail.
signing.confirmAgreeToSign: Please confirm you agree to sign electronically
signing.enterFullName: Please enter your full legal name
